title: Delta Goodrem reveals what it was like attending Kanye Wests' famous and exclusive Sunday Services
text:
She splits her time between Los Angeles and Sydney.

And after being one of the lucky ones to attend, Delta Goodrem, 34, revealed what it is really like to experience one of Kanye West's famous Sunday Services.

After jetting in from California, the Born To Try singer spoke to Today Extra about the special moment, describing it as 'magical' and 'remarkable'.

'It's truly magical and remarkable!' Delta Goodrem has spoken about attending one of Kanye West's Sunday Service - a gospel-rap group created by the American rapper who performs every Sunday

Sunday Service is a gospel-rap group created by the American star, who perform every Sunday.

'It was a wonderful experience to go to Sunday services there, it's truly magical and remarkable,' Delta told hosts David Campbell and Sonia Kruger.

It was over the weekend when Delta first revealed she attended a Sunday Service with the rapper back in April.

Wonderful: She told hosts David Campbell and Sonia Kruger: 'It was a wonderful experience to go to Sunday services there, it's truly magical and remarkable' (Pictured: Kanye West)

'I was lucky enough to go to Kanye Sunday Services a few months ago. It was incredible!' she wrote in a caption of an Instagram story post.

'So I couldn't wait for the album,' she added.

Celebrities who have attended the strictly invite-only event, include Brad Pitt, Justin Bieber, Katy Perry and the Kardashian/Jenner clan.

Her comments came as she attended the launch party for Kanye's latest album Jesus Is King, which she also described as a 'wonderful'.

She took to her Instagram Story to share a glimpse of the event, held at The Forum in Inglewood, as she sang along to the track, Follow God.

Lucky her: Her comments came as she attended the launch party for Kanye's latest album Jesus Is King, which she also described as a 'wonderful'

During her Today Extra appearance on Tuesday, David and Sonia pressed her on how she scored an invite to Kanye's service.

'I can't tell you that, David... I've been around a while,' she laughed.

Delta is set to release her third fragrance called Destiny, exclusive to Chemist Warehouse.
description: She splits her time between Los Angeles and Sydney.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
